description: Greetings! I'm Annaëlle Baiget, a computer science enthusiast driven by a fascination for problem-solving and innovative thinking.

My journey from mathematics Olympiads to CentraleSupélec has ignited a passion for computer science. What captivates me most is the dynamic nature of the field and its potential to create meaningful solutions.
Currently, I'm a Master student in Computer Science at UCLA.

items.title: University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)
items.description: Relevant courses: Software Engineering, Quantum Programming, Human-Computer Interaction, Data Mining

items.title: CentraleSupélec, Paris-Saclay University
items.description:
• General Scientific Education: Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Engineering Sciences, Economy, Finance and Management.
  • Relevant courses: Object Oriented Software Engineering, Optimization, Web and mobile application development, Optimization of passagers transport systems and Serious Game.

items.title: Datamaran
items.description: I contributed to the development of new features for the world's only data-driven platform designed to identify and monitor material Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) risks.

items.title: Paris Digital Lab
items.description: The Paris Digital Lab is an elite computer science track also called the Digital Tech Year. The first semester composed of seven-week projects for top-tier French companies, and internship abroad for the second semester.

items.title: CentraleSupélec, Paris-Saclay University
items.description:
• General Scientific Education: Mathematics, Physics, Computer Science, Engineering Sciences, Economy, Finance and Management.
  • Relevant courses: Algorithmic and Complexity, Statistics and Learning, Information Systems and Programming, Networks and Security, and Convergence, Integration and Probability.

items.title: Lycée Privée Sainte-Geneviève
items.description:
• Fields of study: Mathematics, Physics, Engineering Sciences, Computer Science
  • Highly selective 2-year program, offering intensive preparation to enter the French ”Grandes Ecoles”, at the best French preparatory school.

items.title: Automated Grammar Generation using LLMs
items.description:
• Implemented an automated grammar generation system using LLMs, boosting efficiency in creating software testing grammars.
  • Integrated automated and human feedback to optimize accuracy for unseen domains via few-shot prompting
  • Co-authored comprehensive project report analyzing LLMs’ potential to streamline software development while revealing limitations in handling complex grammar structures. Demonstrated innovative application of AI in software engineering
  • Won ”Outstanding Project Award” highlighting most innovative and promising group project in class

items.title: Cybersecurity Game
items.description: • Designed an innovative cybersecurity educational game for teenagers using GPT-4 to generate a realistic database of scams and normal texts, leveraging a full-stack tech stack including React.JS, TypeScript, Express.JS, and MongoDB to create an engaging platform helping users identify digital fraud

items.title: Datamaran
items.description:
• Led the integration of the Claude2 Anthropic model into an AI-driven chatbot, refining responses and ensuring accuracy.
  • Implemented semantic search with a two-steps chunking algorithm for enhanced platform functionality.
  • Developed a client guide for ESG strategy understanding.
  • Collaborated in a team project to develop an algorithm for checking duplicates in regulations reports.

items.title: FraudNinja
items.description:
• 7-week project for Orange, a french telecom company.
  • Developed an anti-fraud chatbot using a private SDK and created a dashboard to track the chatbot’s performance.
  • Developed algorithms to detect fraudulent links, phone numbers and employed various embedding techniques identify attack patterns within fraudulent SMS.

items.title: Time Series Analysis
items.description:
• 7-week project for Nexans, a french multinational in the cable transmission line industry.
  • Developed a Python algorithm that recognize and analyse patterns in time series in order to be able to point out critical moment and thus reduce energy waste in a cable industry.

items.title: Dashboard
items.description:
• 7-week project for Crédit Agricole Assurances, a prominent french insurance company.
  • Developed an online platform enabling farmers to make declarations, examine previous ones, and alter them if required throw a step-by-step form.
  • Implemented algorithms to cross validate data, extract data from pdf and ensure data reliability.

items.title: Teaching Assistant
items.description:
Teaching Assistant in Information Systems and Programming

Supervised a 30-student advanced class for tutorials on various computer science topics: Python programming, Git, BASH, SQL databases, networks and security.

items.title: Admin platform
items.description:
• Project for the organization, LEKOL.
  • Developed an new platform for teachers to create new exercises and add them automatically to an already existant mobile app.

items.title: Showcase website
items.description:
• Designed and developed the showcase website for the start-up company, Tirelires d’Avenir.
  • Led the front-end development efforts, proposing innovative design solutions to optimize user experience and visual appeal.

items.title: Sokoban Game
items.description:
• Project for the Object-Oriented Software Engineering course.
  • Developed the Sokoban game locally using the Model View Controller architecture.

items.title: VieuxRezo
items.description:
• Project for the ”Coding weeks: Application web” course.
  • Developed an application to facilitated connections between isolated seniors and young volunteers, offering group activities and personalized assistance services.
